actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right of life to the unborn.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that, with respect to the right to life guaranteed in the United States Constitution, every human being, subject to the jurisdiction of the United States, or of any State, shall be deemed, from the moment of fertilization, to be a person and entitled to the right of life.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States guaranteeing the right of life to the unborn.
